data: エエェェェェ（/×＼）ェェｴｴエエ
description: These text faces look to me like they’re surrounded by scary things and they’re kind of freaked out. Either that or they are sensing something scary is about to appear. This list combines a few different scared emotes, such as the ones hiding behind their hands. You can also see a few different types of scared, gasping mouths.  工ｴｴｪｪ(;╹⌓╹)ｪｪｴｴ工 エｴｪｪｪ(●’Д’●)ｪｪｪｴエ エエェェェェ（/×＼）ェェｴｴエエ
title: Surrounded by Fear
